snippet.title: Alf's Escape Trailer - Oddworld: New 'n' Tasty DLC
snippet.description:
Alf's Escape is an expansive bonus chapter for Oddworld: New 'n' Tasty that features brand-new levels designed to push Abe's reflexes and puzzle-solving skills to their limit.

Alf's Escape is currently available as DLC from PlayStation Store (PS4), Steam and GOG.com.

Take control of Abe as he infiltrates never-before seen sectors of RuptureFarms to seek and rescue one final, extra-special Mudokon named Alf. First introduced in Abe's Exoddus, Alf has been running his own venture in the depths of the meat factory, but now it's time to escort him to freedom.

• Steam - http://store.steampowered.com/app/323341/
• PlayStation Store - https://store.playstation.com/#!/games/addons/oddworld-new-%27n%27-tasty-alf%27s-escape-mission/cid=EP4134-CUSA00326_00-ALFESCAPEPS40001
• GOG.com - http://www.gog.com/game/alfs_escape
